reviews.review:
[b]-如果有些事情从未发生，就无所谓忘记了[/b]

这是一部关于美式科幻以及哲学思考作品，故事较为晦涩但是富有哲理引人思考，其讲述了时空穿越、平行世界所出现的问题，一旦有不属于这个世界的人对这个世界做出一些影响，那么这些世界就会永远的纠缠在一起。谁能想到，整个故事男主角对抗的正是自己，不同世界的自己、以及过去的自己。虽然他一直试图拯救伊丽莎白，但他永远没法带给伊丽莎白幸福，因为他才是悲剧的起因。所有为了大义（理想、愿望）而超越界限去做的事情，可以造就英雄，但终究会造成更大的隐患而致使悲剧发生。

在玩之前就看到这部作品被无数人冠以“第九艺术”之称，其实大多游戏都能称上，但是能见有人直接用第九艺术来形容它的作品确实不多见。不过考虑到该游戏于2013年发售，想必当时带给人的震撼应该不小。世界观的架构就非常新奇了，欧洲古典时代加上未来蒸汽朋克，枪械魔法超自然与科学的融合，让人想起了最近的耻辱系列（如果说这种抄袭是在学到精髓情况下发展了自己的特色，那比起某些国产作品来还是可以接受的）。人物也令人印象深刻，伊丽莎白有喜有怒有哀有乐，浑然是一个惹人喜欢的毫不做作的小萝莉。最让人眼前一亮的是游戏死亡画面，有多少游戏就是屏幕一黑帮你自动读个档，然而这个作品还专门为“死亡”做了动画。你会看到你倒下后伊丽莎白拿针（肾上腺素？）把你急救戳起来，这个小细节加分！

在现在看起来生化奇兵无限的画面并不精美，射击感觉也被如果无数游戏超越。但是它的哲学思考与独特新奇的世界塑造造就了它优秀而独特的艺术感。有些艺术你不一定喜欢，但是艺术也应该是包容的，第九艺术何尝不是艺术呢？

-你害怕上帝嗎？不，我害怕的是你。(你害怕的也是你自己)

2017/12/20

Un juego en todo aspecto de la palabra, ¡lo tiene todo!
Gráficos, historia, jugabilidad, banda sonora, etc. Es un juego que debes tener un tu biblioteca si o si.
Lo recomiendo al 100%
10/10
One of the greatest games i have ever played. Huge fan of the whole series. I would highly recommend the game to anyone.
Wer sich für Story interessiert soll sich dieses Spiel nicht alleine kaufen. Nur der Kauf von Bioshock Infinite und Bioshock 1 macht am meisten Sinn.

Bioshock Infinite es una despedida gigante de Irrational Games de la industria. Es un juego maravilloso con uno de los personajes secundarios más memorables que recuerde haber visto. Además, el estilo gráfico que acompaña al juego es una maravilla. 
También veo la necesidad de destacar la optimización de este juego (tengo un I5 de dos núcleos a 2,2 Ghz, 8 Gb de Ram y una Intel HD Graphics 5500), que a pesar de que tengo un equipo modesto, me permitió jugar la mayoría de la experiencia (por no decir toda) a más de 30 fps.
El sonido y la banda sonora en general acompañan bastante bien el ritmo del juego. Lo único que se le puede reclamar al juego es una pequeña simplificación de las mecánicas de juego comparado con el primer Bioshock, sin embargo, el juego sigue siendo sobresaliente.
¡Gracias Levine e Irrational!
一开始我以为是个蒸汽朋克故事，后来发现这其实是个量子物理科普，在玩着玩着发现这他妈是个恐怖游戏啊！好在最后终于回归了，变成了一个家庭哲学宗教故事。。玩完了一直在深呼吸。。这故事太沉重了，女主形象塑造的太真实了。。

[AR] 
[u]أعجبني[/u]
[list]
[*]تندمج بسرعه في اللعبة و اجوائها
[*]الحوارات اللي بين الاعداء في اللعبة ممتازة و تعطي اللاعب معلومات مهمة عن القصة وأحداثها
[*]ممتازة بعد(Looting)القدرات الخاصة تساعد اللاعب في القتال و في أماكن كثيرة غيرها في اللعبة وتضيف متعه و عناصر ال (Vigors)
[*]الشخصية المساعدة لها دور مهم في القصة و اللعب كثير ما تشوفها تساعدك في اللحظات المناسبة (Elizabeth)
[/list]
[u]ما أعجبني[/u]
[list]
[*]تقطيع في الشاشة (Screen tearing)
[/list]

Compre, mas compre para jogar!

Se você for explorador como eu, talvez renda 45 horas de gameplay, impossível passar disto.

Preste muita atenção em tudo que acontece, ouça as gravações (leia as gravações no menu, caso não entenda as gravações em inglês), se você for atencioso, entenderá o jogo na única vez que finalizá-lo, caso contrário, terá que zerar o jogo novamente, para encaixar todas as peças.

Bioshock Infinite é rico em história, é rejogável, e com certeza você irá querer jogá-lo novamente, mesmo caso tenha entendido a história na primeira vez.

Recomendo.

Nota 10/10.
Amazing game. Great story. Amazing graphics, 100percent recommend this game for anyone who loves an FPS with a great story and soundtrack.

No sabría decir cual es mi BioShock favorito, el 1 y 2 me los he pasado como 6 o 7 veces, el Infinite, me lo acabe por segunda vez hace como 10 meses, y lo empece hace una semana en el modo 1999. (Dificultada mas alta, desbloqueada despues de pasartelo 1 vez)

Todos tienen algo que me fascina, nose si es la idea de las ciudades bajo el agua, o en las nubes como en Infinite,
no se si es por la historia tan rebuscada que envuelve Rapture y Columbia, universos distintos, mismo espacio tiempo, distinto lugar y distinto momento, es una saga bastante mimada y muy bien cuidada. Recomiendo todos y cada uno.
Cara esse jogo revela muita coisa da historia dos bioshocks e tambem da medo

如果有人问你，为什么游戏可以被称为第九艺术？而你又无法用三言两语解释清楚时，你可以为他展示（或推荐）这款游戏。这就是第九艺术。画面，音乐，游戏性，打击感，完美的融合在一起。

이 게임을 플레이하면서,

암살이 여기선 쓸데없다는 것을 알게 되었고,(바다의 무덤 2회는 자연스럽게 암살 플레이를 하게 되드라고요.)
무쌍이 재미있다는 것을 느꼈고,(심지어 스나이퍼 라이플을 글옵 AWP처럼 쓰는 명장면이...)
적들이 하드코어해도 해낼 수 있다는 것을 느꼈고,(그래도 핸디맨 개객끼)
스팀 게임 중 엔딩에 대한 해석을 알아보는 최초의 게임이 되었고,
전투 중 누군가가 버프를 걸어주는 게 얼마나 편한지 깨닫게 되었고,

그리고.....

Vale a pena comprar mesmo q não esteja na promoção. Um jogo q deve ser jogado!

Bioshock Infinite is a very thrilling and exciting shooter. It's a storydriven shooter without any amount of text to read. You discover audio logs on the way like in other shock-titles to discover bits of a very deep and I'd say original story, that - as the name suggests - is a shocking experience. Combat in this game is tight with distinguishable enemy types, weapons and vigors, that are your secondary, but much needed firepower. The graphics are beautiful, music is orchestral and very fitting, characters are absolutely brilliant and the story with or without the DLCs will leave you thinking.

All in all an excellent shooter that is a must play for any who appreciates a mix of story and action seamlessly blend together. Not just quite as good as the original Bioshock, but still one of the best there is.

Hayatımda bu kadar iyi hazırlanmış sayılı oyun gördüm . FPS oyunlarında benim gibi hikayeye önem bir kişiyseniz bu oyunu çok seveceksiniz . Aynı zamanda durup etrafı seyir edebileceğiniz bir oyun size görevleri dayayıp boğmuyor gayet rahat oynanabilecek , bir video oyunundan beklentilerinizi tamamen karşılayacak mükemmel ötesi bir yapım . Ben indirimde iken aldım ama indirimsiz hali bile vereceğiniz paraya değer .
Oyunun atmosferini ve elizabeth'in çevreyle olan etkileşimleri çok iyiydi gidip duvarlara yaslanması, etraftaki nesnelere gözatması, boşbulduğu sandalyelere oturması çok doğal hissettirdi nedense. :D

This is probably my new favorite shooter of all time. I can't think of anyhting else that came close to this! 

I will warn you, It isn't like the other Bioshock games. This has no choices that change the ending, just little things in the playthrough. On the brightside, you have all the plasmids (in Infinite they're called vigers!) you collect on you at once, except you can only have two guns at a time! Honestly, I found it way easier than the having to scroll though 8 guns. Also! No hacking, you can possess things and turn them against your foes. Also, you don't pick any locks, Elizabeth does that :3
Melhor jogo de FPS que já joguei!!

꿀잼

스토리 , 분위기 사기겜

전편에 비해 시스템이 살짝 아쉽지만

충분히 가치가 있는 게임

Imagine a beguiling flying city, existing in the sky, gravitating amidst the clouds, immersed in a Victorian and post Victorian era which conflates with art-deco style and a pinch of steam punk universe.

This almighty floating city of Columbia initially captures the essence of a harmonious, peaceful, self-supporting and paradisiacal city, where everyone you encounter appear to be happy. Many sections in Columbia are populated with all kinds of people imprinting their own unique expressions in life, from school children, lovers, admen, to vendors. Exploring this splendid city, you will come upon buildings, blocks and even districts teeming with shops that sell all kinds of services and goods such as books, clothes, records, sweets, etc. You will notice people’s interaction by their occasional private gossip, romantic flirtations and beatific smiles in the richest districts of the city.

From time to time you can witness eye catching moments of flying buildings, attaching themselves together just like a cruise boat entering a dock, a singing quartet with such a beautiful melody perfectly synchronized, family picnics and children playing around under the warm gleaming sun. Such breathtaking scenery!

The story occurs in 1912, you play the role of Booker DeWitt, a former soldier and Pinkerton Agent ashamed by his bitter dark past that has tainted his soul with an achingly heavy burden, the only way to cleanse such debt is to accept the deal made by an anonymous client. The agreement falls on the goal of saving a young woman named Elizabeth. The only hassle in the task appears when Booker finds out that the girl is held captive in an enormous tower in Columbia.

Elizabeth’s captor is known in Columbia by Father Zackery Comstock (The Prophet), the religious villain dictator who rules over the city, enslaving everybody to obedience. Those who beg to differ with Comstock’s views will be imprisoned for blasphemous actions and statements against Columbia’s laws.

Bioshock Infinite focuses most of its efforts in bringing to life one of the most iconic A.I. companions in gaming history. Elizabeth who plays a central role in Bioshock infinite is a dashed complex, naïve, curious, desperate and strong willed character, able to fully interact with other characters and environments around her. She will never abandon the player or make you feel lonely, her main goal is to aid you in combat by opening rifts in time & space and bringing into our world health bottles, money, ammo supplies, gun turrets, grapple hooks and walls for cover. Elizabeth is an overwhelmingly gifted young girl with her psychic powers reaching very high levels. All of Elizabeth’s manifestations allow the player an array of strategic options to deal with sticky situations.

Elizabeth’s facial expressions display a wide spectrum of emotions like love, hate, disgust, sympathy, fear and even guilt. She provides the motivation the player needs for the story to move forward, her presence alongside you always bring a new experience.

In Bioshock Infinite’s combat system the player assumes the field of vision of the protagonist with special abilities that are held on the left hand and fire guns on the right hand.

The skylines are the new addition and system innovation to the game series. Booker is able to ride the roller coaster rail tracks with the sky hook as a means of transportation in high speeds around Columbia, moving from city block to city block. The Skylines prove out to be highly intuitive, effective in combat and escapes. The games most acclaimed fights arise from colossal wide spread areas.Skylines can serve you as a tactical advantage by simply swooping down on enemies for a surprise attack.

Bioshock Infinite bestows the player with various firearms and vigor's you collect along your journey. In-game you are provided with such instruments of devastation that undoubtedly catapults the game to an extreme action oriented FPS. The powers and weapons you possess can be combined to execute a more effective outcome. Some abilities range from electrifying enemies as they wobble around with no motor coordination, commanding a flock of crows to peck enemies to death, setting enemies on fire and watching them scream, delivering lethal attacks with your sky-hook that decapitate your enemies, levitating enemies into the air, dashing at enemies with an explosive impact, knocking enemies with waves of water, to using tendrils that snatch snipers from a long distance. All existent vigors in the game are the following: Bucking Bronco, Charge, Devil’s Kiss, Murder of Crows, Possession, Return to Sender, Shock Jockey and Undertow. For the weapons we can count on the Burstgun, Carbine, Crank Gun, Hail Fire, Hand Cannon, Heater, Machine Gun, Pistol, Repeater, RPG, Shotgun, Sky-Hook, Sniper Rifle and last but not least the Volley Gun.

Throughout the game you will confront extremely challenging enemies, I will only mention the most threatening and heavy hitters in the game which are the following: The Handyman, Fireman, Zealot of the Lady, Mechanical Patriots, The Beast, Siren and the Boy Of Silence.

Graphically the game presents a dayglo, enriched colour template which clearly reveals all the beauty of the game, every area is never the same. All the colours combined blaze the screen leaving any player dazzled in wonder. The city is truly unrivalled with arresting high resolutions textures, including meticulous in-depth faces detailed to near perfection, a heavenly place that any player will desire to experience. The environment and the music vibrate to the storyline, each district contains a unique ambience that accommodates the player to a fantastic adventure provoking new sensations.

Bioshock Infinite has reached 11 million sales until this date, making it the most popular game of the series.

Infinite has managed to stamp the gaming Industry with an exquisite avant-garde world containing Sci-Fi architecture splashed with steam punk technology style and with ravishing, mesmerizing and picturesque scenery. All characters deliver evocative moments linked to striking emotional breakthroughs, plus memorable baddies.

Bioshock Infinite’s sublime story propels the series to new heights, an accomplishment beyond extraordinary!

날고있다. 그리고 리볼버로 적을 쓰러뜨릴때 마치 석양이지며 올킬을 하는 느낌의 타격감과 어느샌가

Wundervoll dieses Spiel ;D Die Grafik ist der Hammer! :D wobei ich beim Ende sehr traurig war :(
Spoileralarm! Booker DeWitt wurde nie geboren!!!
스토리가 굉장히 마음에 들었다. 인생 명작인듯
Despite the sotry making absolutely no sense the third time around, HOLY CRAP I love this game.Runs beautifuly at high setting on midrange last gen gear and the gameplay is a bloody good time!

Eu amo de paixão a saga de Bioshock, e obviamente não seria diferente com esta continuação indireta!! Dessa vez deixaram um pouco de lado toda aquela ideia de Rapture e cidade subaquática, e inverteram a questão para uma cidade nas nuvens denominada Columbia... confesso que foi uma inovação necessária para a até então trilogia não prevalescer da mesma maneira, entretanto todo o clima de terror foi quebrado com cenários bonitos e com muita iluminação. É um ótimo jogo para tirar fotinhas e se divertir cm batalhas frenéticas e poderes diversificados, entretanto para os fãs da ideia original de Rapture, é meio que uma exigência comprar as DLCs, e eu honestamente gostei mais das DLCs que do jogo em si, pois elas se passam em Rapture e mostram como era a cidade antes de ser destruída.. e melhor que isso, elas mostram como o Fontaine conseguiu arquitetar todo aquele plano maluco do Bioshock 1, explicando até mesmo sobre o famoso e insuperável "Would you Kindly". Também fornecem uma experiência totalmente nova com uma demonstração de Stealth na parte sombria de Rapture, tendo até mesmo um plasmid de invibilidade e a sensação de suspense por não poder ficar lutando contra spliters e big daddies, apenas poder correr e se esconder... simplesmente perfeito!
Beautiful graphics, clever story

“好山、好水、好字、好画、好酒、好烟、好茶、好歌、好车、好姑娘……我觉得这个世界凡是美好的东西都值得人去细细品味，体会绵延悠长的余味，还能引发人静静的思索，探寻美好是如何给人带来快乐，好的游戏应该也不例外，生化奇兵系列就是其中的佼佼者。”
首先本文只要针对游戏剧情大结局的理解，主要是理清玩家逻辑思路上的纠结，不对游戏中的文化艺术背景做解读（如美国独立战争史，美国南北战争史，印第安人战争史、西部拓荒、义和团运动、废奴运动，工人改革，基督教改革以及蒸汽二极管朋克风格、洛可可风格、巴洛克风格、维多利亚风格、古典交响、唱诗班合唱、蓝调、爵士、pinup girls、百老汇）

因此下文涉及剧透，请注意，但其实并没有什么关系（如果你没玩过这款游戏那么即便剧透其实也不会看的明白）

弯弯绕，绕弯弯谜一般的烧脑剧情，属于越玩越迷糊打穿了游戏变成了智障的经典游戏.

并且我不想对游戏中的女主人公做任何感性评价，可以想见在男性荷尔蒙为主导的电子游戏领域一个塑造成功的女性角色是多么的深入人心，看看其他人的评测就知道了（横向类比的话可参考巫师中的女儿希里和众多女术士以及行尸走肉游戏版中的克莱蒙特，我们身边的狼中的白雪，美国末日中的艾莉，质量效应中的蓝妹，龙腾世纪中的蕾莉安娜，黑暗之魂中的防火女，还有大名鼎鼎的古墓丽影劳拉等等以至于日韩类游戏诸如猎天使魔女中的贝优妮塔和街霸中的春丽与生化危机中的艾达王等以此类推都没有计算在内更不用说良莠不齐的众多文字恋爱类游戏里多如牛毛的女角色群像）所以我对伊丽莎白的评价绝对不会是“我是个纯粹的人，你给我看奶子，我给你钱，就这么简单”这种内容，但从游戏性上来讲伊丽莎白可以称得上是神AI了，没钱给钱，没药给药，没子弹给子弹，开门撬锁、死了复活、绝不卡壳绝不堵门，实在不行就撕开个裂境帮你召唤炮台、盟友、诱饵、血包、贩卖机等等总之是凡所应有无所不有，很多时候的表现要比真人玩家队友还要优秀，使得游戏体验相当不错，俗话说的女儿是父亲上辈子的情人这种事我不清楚，但绝对是贴心的小棉袄。
那么在开始评价这个游戏之前需要明确几个游戏设定
1、量子物理学中提及的平行宇宙的概念（包括可说不说的薛定谔的喵）
2、悖论
3、常量与定量
4、鲁特斯兄妹

再有这款游戏玩懂玩透需要不少知识点，我不愿提及游戏中的文化艺术内容完全可以私下查阅相关资料，玩家理解应该不成问题，而关于逻辑设定上的理解则是需要玩家有一个清晰的思路才能理顺，否则极其容易陷入悖论的怪圈，那么我就尝试理清这个怪圈（网络上关于生化奇兵逻辑世界的分析有很多，但除了官方以外都不具有权威性，存在大量脑洞，我写的也不例外，玩家可以对比着参考着来理解）
一开始的切入点是要搞懂一切就要先搞懂鲁特斯兄妹，否则其他无从谈起（他们是一切的始作俑者）
鲁特斯兄妹：
1、鲁特斯兄妹是非常优秀的量子物理学家，大多数时间保持理性，几乎不存在感情用事，哥伦比亚城漂浮天空的技术和穿越时空的机器以及天使塔的虹吸装置都是他们的发明，并且使天父康斯托克拥有可以预知未来的的能力。
2、后来的鲁特斯兄妹由于被迫害并且预见到哥伦比亚的毁灭，因此决心扭转一切，游戏中的抛硬币、选首饰、送护盾等都是他们在测试主角的行为是否使一切步入正轨。
3、鲁特斯兄妹是一个人，他们是穿越不同位面的自己相同却又不同的存在，常量与变量的关系。
4、游戏一开始就遇到让你抛硬币的一男一女就是鲁特斯兄妹，他们会在游戏中多次出现，说的话玄之又玄。
5、网络对鲁特斯兄妹的分析很多，但往往忽略其是怎样的一个存在，鲁特斯兄妹的能力无法估量，但是可以肯定的是无限接近于神明，他们由于受到康斯托克的陷害（具体缘由玩家可在游戏中了解）在穿越时空的时候被炸弹炸死，并且明确指出肉体消亡，以灵魂的姿态获得了可以在各个宇宙中随意穿行的能力，因为本身是量子物理学家并且没有肉身的束缚，其穿越能力和理解平行宇宙之间的相互作用能力必定远远强于伊丽莎白，并具备干扰各个时空的能力。
6、鲁特斯兄妹虽然具备干扰各个时空的强大能力但是保持有限的克制是在于所有的一切都是他们的一场实验，通过一定的引导在尽量不干涉当前宇宙环境、人物的前提下观察各个平行宇宙相互之间的作用、影响、关系，后来发现这种干扰会使各个空间产生混乱准备把一切恢复到正轨，但是仍然居于幕后对恢复到额过程进行观察实验。
7、鲁特斯兄妹通过对本来永不相交和影响的平行宇宙进行有限干涉后发现：
（1）普通人在穿越多个世界后记忆会发生错乱，造成一部分的记忆丢失，而失去的记忆会让大脑生理本能产生原先没有的记忆来填
         补空白  一种自我的生理欺骗；
（2）普通人在穿行多个宇宙后会发生每一个其他位面的自己死去后自己都会流鼻血这种明显的生理症状（与记忆受损有关）。
（3）普通人穿越多个平行世界后会对身体产生影响，如癌症、快速衰老、不孕不育等。
 游戏本体的流程不谈，只说结局，因为争议都在这里，生化奇兵无限的原版剧情理解不难（相对于海葬资料片）往往多数争论的环节都在大结局是否所有的伊丽莎白都已经死亡，我的理解是所有的伊丽莎白都死了。还有一个争议点是是否所有的侦探布克和天父康斯托克都已经死了（布克和康斯托克为同一个人在不同宇宙的不同存在）关键就在洗礼环节。主世界的人是侦探布克，副世界的就是天父康斯托克，而造成一个人在不同的宇宙扮演不同的角色就在于是否接受洗礼，接受就会是天父，不接受就是侦探，那么要想消灭天父最好的办法就是在做出选择前杀死自己（布克是这么想的），做出选择之后再杀死是毫无用处的，这也是很多人脑洞认为还有一个世界的布克和安娜以及主世界的伊丽莎白还活着的原因，但是并不存在，再重申一遍，做出选择后的死亡毫无意义。

伊丽莎白在不同世界也有两种身份，当天父的女儿就是伊丽莎白，做布克的女儿就是安娜，而不管是伊丽莎白还是安娜其都是布克在拒绝洗礼后所生，而天父康斯托克由于不孕不育（前面有说原因）是抢的布克女儿并起名叫伊丽莎白，所以在洗礼前淹死布克，那么所有世界的布克和天父，安娜和伊丽莎白都会消失。其实很好理解的剧情可能游戏制作方为了艺术效果卖了个关子，结局布克在洗礼前被淹死后各个世界的伊丽莎白开始逐个消失此时便会黑屏，你是看不到所有伊丽莎白消失完的，只能听到弹琴的叮叮声，每一个叮代表着一个伊丽莎白的消失，叮叮叮到最后一个音符是个咚声，然后就出字幕结束，后面还有一个布克从侦探社桌子上醒来的彩蛋，包括后续DLC海葬中伊丽莎白的再次出现，使得很多玩家对此抱有争议，我不得不佩服游戏制作的精良，尤其是结局模棱两可的设计使得原本绝望的结局有了一丝转机，许多不愿看伊丽莎白如此结局的玩家开始纠结那最后的咚声是不是表示还有一个主世界的伊丽莎白没有死，最后醒来的布克是不是另一个平行世界仅存的硕果，一个只有布克和安娜的世界，这些官方没有给出答案，开放的结局可以使玩家脑洞出不同的答案，因此我所给出的结论是根据游戏既有的内容作出的，尽量不开脑洞。

那么再说海葬剧情，由于我的论断那么海葬剧情一开始出现的成年伊丽莎白似乎和本体结局对不上，但实际是可以联系上的，首先需要清楚的一个误区是海葬的开始并不是接着无限的结局走的，海葬的故事地点发生在生化奇兵一里的销魂城，而这里的伊丽莎白已经成年，是在销魂城生活过相当长一段时间了，甚至还当过歌手，发过唱片，而其在销魂城蛰伏这么久就是为了追杀在销魂城假扮成侦探布克的天父康斯托克（至于为什么假扮，又为什么跑到销魂城来游戏中有讲解，不再复述），但是可以肯定的是既然康斯托克还在那么这个时间线就不会发生在本体结局之后，虽然销魂城是1958年，哥伦比亚城市1912年，但是这里的康斯托克是从另一个宇宙跑过来的，而伊丽莎白一路追过来还蛰伏了很久，因此只要有康斯托克在那么就绝对不会发生在无限结局之后，而是发生在无限结局之前布克救出伊丽莎白摧毁天使塔彻底解放伊丽莎白能力之后，伊丽莎白拥有了全部的能力，全知全能，而康斯托克未死，于是伊丽莎白穿越另一个时空去阻止康斯托克抢夺安娜（海葬一的剧情），布克在洗礼前淹死自己是一个关键环节，一劳永逸的解决问题永久的使康斯托克消失，结束伊丽莎白的苦难（前面我说了，这是布克的想法）伊丽莎白的想法呢？康斯托克与布克在传送门前抢夺安娜也是一个关键环节，伊丽莎白选择传送到这个关键点来阻止康斯托克可以明显看出伊丽莎白的目的并不是一定要消灭康斯托克，她只需要把安娜留在布克身边就好了，这样虽然伊丽莎白会消失，但是他就会以安娜的身份永远的留在布克身边了，康斯托克死活并不重要，这才是伊丽莎白的想法，虽然最后失败了，这才引出康斯托克出逃，伊丽莎白追杀的内容（详见于海葬一的剧情）。

那么海葬一的结尾伊丽莎白还是死了，海葬二一开始又活了，这是怎么回事？很简单，鲁特斯兄妹复活了她，这也是他们在实验中进行一定干涉从而观察结果的研究行为，但是复活的伊丽莎白却能看到自己死去的尸体，用鲁特斯兄妹的原话来说就是你能活过来完全是因为你拥有穿梭不同时空的能力，如果你想回到自己死去的世界那么就必须变成一个普通人。所以复活后的伊丽莎白小拇指没有断也就没有了超能力，但是最后结局伊丽莎白头部受到重击后依然获得了部分预知未来的能力，这一点跟鲁特斯兄妹很像，一样又不一样，不一样又一样，有些会改变，有些却永远不会变，常量与变量。但是随着海葬二最后结局伊丽莎白的死去，可以肯定的是所有位面的布克、康斯托克伊丽莎白全部死亡，无一幸免，接下来就是生化奇兵一的剧情了。

当然仍然有些玩家脑洞认为有另外一个受影响的位面里布克和安娜幸福的生活着，我对此不置可否，毕竟我想这也是游戏想带给玩家的感受，结局存在每一个人的心中，你怎么想，结局就是在怎样的。

常常有玩家把游戏称之为第九艺术，但我认为作为新兴文化的游戏与传统艺术相比仍然有其局限性，毕竟好的艺术作品是需要经受时间的历练，并且随着时代不断地发展和进步，原本服务于少数人的文化艺术拥有更多的渠道被普罗大众所接触和接受，但有别于主观上玩家喜欢把自己痴迷的游戏动不动就贴上艺术品的标签，这本身就是对艺术的亵渎，艺术有多种的表现方式，但是优秀的艺术作品绝对没有这么廉价，可是如果一定要罗列出可以称得上是优秀艺术的游戏作品的话，那么我想生化奇兵应该占有一席之地。

— Букер, ты боишься бога?
— Нет. Но тебя — боюсь.
to me the best bioshock of the three, a nice story with characters that you'll love, and the dlc literally ends the story from the 1st game , btw this game has references to the 1st one ;)
Very nice deep story

I got this game twice.  I had it previously on the xbox 360 and again on pc.  It's a great story driven game that takes the player on a journey.  This game is often criticized for its linear play style and lack of real choices but it really drives home the point of this game for me. The art style of this game is absolutely enthralling and the sound and game design are full of detail.  The game was made even better by the dlcs that add the shoot-em-up galleries to the game, which was something much needed in the game (Though I'd have preferred it came with the game itself).  The second dlc to add to the game was pretty much a game in itself.  So overall I would give this game a positive review.  I've seen dlcs done wrong and this game does it right.

At first, the game seemed pretty normal and straightforward, yet the more you play, the more you know about the story, and hence, the more you love the ending of the game "when" (little reference there) everything gets pieced together. I almost cried, again.
топ

To be honest, I didn't enjoy Infinite as much as the first 2 games of the franchise, simply because all the encounters were very predictable. It's very common in modern shooters, every part of the game is scripted and you can easily tell whether you are in danger or not. In the first 2 Bioshocks, the encounters were surprising and still the combat was good.

Story and Setting
The sky-city was really an amazing setting and the graphics were beautiful, but the story lacked a bit creativity. It's this lone wolf guy who doesn't want to show any emotions and then gets paired up with young and ambitious sunshine-girl. They first like each other, then get seperated because of some stupid mistake or a lie - they hate each other - and finally a happy ending where love rules over eveything else. So Hollywood like.
BUT I have to admit I was positively surprised by the ending.

I give my recommendation even though I would rate this game only a 6/10.

I had heard a lot about Bioshock, nothing specific, but just really good comments. Went to JB-HI-FI, asked about it, also recommended by the staff there. I saw BioShock: The Collection, saw the great reviews, the brilliant value and just took a risk. It. Paid. Off. If you're looking for some great FPS gameplay, these are the games for you. Great graphic quality and an great storyline, this series ticks so many boxes. As for Infinite as a stand alone game, it's a brilliant addition, especially after the (let's be honest, only an okay) sequel, this game really brings the series home. Stunning design, a slightly complex but not overwhelming plot, and really, REALLY great DLC, for me this is all I could want in a game. 

Buy the whole collection, you WILL NOT be disappointed.

Начиналось как обычный, ни чем не примечательный шутер, но после того, как нашел Элизабет, понимаешь, что это не обычная пострелушка, а драма с глубоким смыслом. Сразу заметен контраст по сравнению с предыдущими частями, там мы находились в подводном мире, тут в летающем городе. Очень красивая и яркая графика, прекрасные пейзажи, дизайн уровней великолепный. Так же понравилась фишка с аэротрассами. А концовка так вообще взрыв мозга, которую я еще несколько часов пытался переварить и понять ее смысл.

One of the best games to ever be produced. After finishing this, I don't even consider this a game anymore. It's more of a long adventure that you get to be part of. This was a masterpiece of games. 

Things escalate so quickly. First you are just a depressed dad, then you end up in a city that floats in the fucking sky. and the graphics are so good, you get to enjoy the beauty of the city. Then suddenly you are already jumping through the 5th dimension. Elizabeth will leave a hole in your heart when you finish the game because she is just amazing. Just. Buy it. It's not a game. It's another world.

Controls: 9.5/10 Iit was almost perfect actually.) 
Graphics: 9.5/10 (A bit cartoonish styled. The best kind)
Duration: 9/10 (~8 hours, but enough for this type of game. I just wish there was more of Elizabeth.)
DLC: 10/10 (plot twists included. the ending of the game put the closure of his story. the DLC puts the closure to the universe.)

You WILL love it. No way around it!
Great game. Story seemed very long to be honest. The graphics are great and the actual mechanics are okay. But the ending alone will blow your mind, thus it is a must play.

9/10 amazing game. Gunplay that is constantly challenging but fair, paired with a storyline that intrigues, fascinates, and will have you searching up an explanation for the ending. Each character is interesting in their own way and were written fantastically. The assortment of vigors and weapons allow you to take control of fights in your own way, and give you a feeling of true accomplishment after every chapter. My only qualm with this game is a certain boss battle near the end that can be kind of unfair. 

TL;DR: Beaten the game, read an article on IGN explaining the game and I still dont fully understand what the fuck the game's full story is. All I know is my money was not wasted

DON'T BUY THIS GAME IF YOU HAVE AN NVIDIA CARD. The game stutters and you can only fix it so much but it won't go away completely. It's a shame because the game is really good and the story is mindblowing.
If you do buy it and have these issues, ask for a refund immediately because steam won't care that 2YK doesn't care that you tried to fix the issues by yourself.
